task: Debug and fix preview issues in Bolt

context.project: React application using Vite and Supabase
context.symptoms: Preview displays a blank white screen
known_issues: Supabase environment variables may not be properly configured
Main entry point or routing might be misaligned
Tailwind CSS styles may not be applied correctly
requirements: Identify and resolve the root cause of the blank screen
Ensure all components render properly in the preview
Verify integration with Supabase API is functioning

steps: Check the `vite.config.ts` file to ensure the `root` and `base` paths are correctly set for Bolt's environment.
Verify that all environment variables (`VITE_SUPABASE_URL`, `VITE_SUPABASE_KEY`) are accessible and loaded properly.
Inspect the entry point (e.g., `src/main.tsx` or `src/index.tsx`) to ensure the React root is being rendered into a valid DOM element.
Check for any unhandled runtime errors in the browser console or network errors in the DevTools.
Review Tailwind CSS setup to confirm styles are being built and applied correctly. Rebuild styles if necessary.
Test for issues in routing (e.g., React Router setup) that may result in the app loading without visible content.
Provide debugging logs or a summary of fixes to ensure the application displays correctly in preview mode.
